summary: Neuschwanstein Castle is a beautiful palace in the mountains of southern Germany. King Ludwig II built it in the 19th century as a special place to escape from his life in the city. He loved the music of Richard Wagner and wanted to honor him with this castle. Even though it wasn't finished, people started visiting it after the king died. Today, many tourists come to see its stunning location and unique design.
title: Neuschwanstein Castle
